articles.author: John Meyer
articles.title: Study: Colorado gyms safer during pandemic than previously thought - The Know
articles.description: There is no correlation between Colorado gym attendance and COVID-19 infections, according to a new study from the University of Oregon.
articles.content:
Colorado gyms and health clubs have accounted for “no outbreaks” of COVID-19, according to CDPHE statistics analyzed by researchers at the University of Oregon. (Provided by Planet Fitness)
